name: Space Collector (KKKostyaGames)
description:
В игре присутствует перевод на Русский язык.

 Space Collector is a game about sorting ships with different abilities by color using the mouse.

 The gameplay sounds too simple at first glance, but the complexity of the game increases over time, and not because of the number of enemies, but their abilities. For example, the Oval ship will use a teleporter to prevent you from moving it to the correct sorting box.
There are currently 23 levels in the game, including 4 bonus levels. There is also an endless mode. After completing each level, you will be able to unlock various cosmetics, such as ship flight particles.

 Game length: The passage of the game will most likely take you about 2 hours. This time may increase if you often replay the same levels or want to open all cosmetics.

 Simple music, composed by me, so you will not have copyright problems.

      Controls:
        Mouse - drag and drop ships
        "R" - restart the level 
        "Esc" - return to the main menu 
        "Delete" - delete all saves

 Important Notes:
 - The "Quit" button is the only way to save game data. Unfortunately, because im crooked-handed, it will not close the game, so just close the game window after clicking. Once again I apologize for the inconvenience caused.
- Mac OS and Linux versions have not been tested. This means that it is possible that they will not even open, or they will have some bugs. You can report bugs, but the best I can do is remove those versions.

I would be very happy if you write a review after playing the game. Thanks for your time ^-^
